Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (12 ll.), verso pasted down. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Lease of land for one year by Petetuot son of ... to Petearsemtheus son of Panobchunis & his brothers. Date. year 10 Pharmuthi 28 of unnamed King, either Soter II = BC. 107 May 14 or Alexander = BC. 104 May 13". Concerning this group of texts, see entry for P BM EA 10491.
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Bibliography Felber, H., Demotische Ackerpachtverträge (ÄA 58). Wiesbaden, 1997, pg 166, n.310. Text 20 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (C J Martin)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (315) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/315)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
